text: == Events == * May 8 – Kentishmen revolt against King Henry VI. * June 18 – rebels are driven from London by loyal troops, bringing about the collapse of the rebellion. * Wolves enter Paris and kill 40 citizens * Age of Discovery starts. * A revolt ends Mayapan's rule over all of the Yucatán. == Births == * Bartolomeu Dias, Portuguese explorer (d. 1500)
